code: import React from"react";import"./SkillsCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SkillsCard=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card_container my-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"".concat(item.icon," skills-icon")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item_name",children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.level==="advanced"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-green-700 green-line",children:"Advanced"}):item.level==="middle"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-orange-600 orange-line",children:"Middle"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-red-600 red-line",children:"Beginner"})})]})]})},item.name);};export default SkillsCard;
